thread.title: Immigrant dinner series looks to unite people through their palates
thread.title_full: Immigrant dinner series looks to unite people through their palates

author: Joseph Hernandez
title: Immigrant dinner series looks to unite people through their palates
text:
Food & Dining Restaurants Immigrant dinner series looks to unite people through their palates 
Southport & Irving restaurant launches Unity in Diversity dinner series to bring the cooking of immigrant grandmas to diners. Joseph Hernandez 
Twitter @joeybear85 
After trying 32 kinds of xiaolongbao, reporter Louisa Chu compiled her list of the best places to try them in Chicago. 
First, we found the best hot chocolate in Chicago . Now, we track down the city's best chocolate cake, from chocolate tres leches cake to 23-layer insanity.
